notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was financially supported by the Chulalongkorn University Center of Excellence in Systems Biology; the Thailand Research Fund (TRF) (RSA6180035); Office of Higher Education Commission (NRU59-029-HR); National Science and Technology Development Agency (NSTDA) (P-17-51377); Chulalongkorn Academic Advancement into its 2nd Century Project.
